name: Joshua Hsu
bio: I am a software engineer with a demonstrated history in education and arts management, instructional design and implementation; a passionate leader skilled in vision building, customer relationship management, content writing, and public speaking, I am excited by and enjoy working on innovative, immersive, collaborative projects that spark creativity, conversation, and joy.
welcometext: Welcome to my page! I'm Joshua Hsu (pronounced 'Shoe').
current: I'm currently based out of Portland, Maine, where I live with my partner, two children, and two dogs.
